TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Matrix extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: The Matrix class holds a 3x3 matrix for transforming coordinates.

remarks.para: The Matrix class holds a 3x3 matrix for transforming coordinates.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool Invert (Android.Graphics.Matrix inverse);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Invert(class Android.Graphics.Matrix inverse) cil managed

Docs.summary: If this matrix can be inverted, return true and if inverse is not null, set inverse to be the inverse of this matrix.

remarks.para: If this matrix can be inverted, return true and if inverse is not null, set inverse to be the inverse of this matrix. If this matrix cannot be inverted, ignore inverse and return false.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool IsAffine { get; }
.property instance bool IsAffine

Docs.summary: Gets whether this matrix is affine.

remarks.para: Gets whether this matrix is affine. An affine matrix preserves straight lines and has no perspective.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool IsIdentity { get; }

Docs.summary: Returns true if the matrix is identity.

remarks.para: Returns true if the matrix is identity. This maybe faster than testing if (getType() == 0)

Docs.param: The array of dst points (x,y pairs)
The array of src points (x,y pairs)
Docs.summary: Apply this matrix to the array of 2D points specified by src, and write the transformed points into the array of points specified by dst.

remarks.para: Apply this matrix to the array of 2D points specified by src, and write the transformed points into the array of points specified by dst. The two arrays represent their "points" as pairs of floats [x, y].

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual float MapRadius (float radius);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance float32 MapRadius(float32 radius) cil managed

Docs.summary: Return the mean radius of a circle after it has been mapped by this matrix.

remarks.para: Return the mean radius of a circle after it has been mapped by this matrix. NOTE: in perspective this value assumes the circle has its center at the origin.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool MapRect (Android.Graphics.RectF rect);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool MapRect(class Android.Graphics.RectF rect) cil managed

Docs.summary: Apply this matrix to the rectangle, and write the transformed rectangle back into it.

remarks.para: Apply this matrix to the rectangle, and write the transformed rectangle back into it. This is accomplished by transforming the 4 corners of rect, and then setting it to the bounds of those points

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool MapRect (Android.Graphics.RectF dst, Android.Graphics.RectF src);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool MapRect(class Android.Graphics.RectF dst, class Android.Graphics.RectF src) cil managed

Docs.param: Where the transformed rectangle is written.
The original rectangle to be transformed.
Docs.summary: Apply this matrix to the src rectangle, and write the transformed rectangle into dst.

remarks.para: Apply this matrix to the src rectangle, and write the transformed rectangle into dst. This is accomplished by transforming the 4 corners of src, and then setting dst to the bounds of those points.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void MapVectors (float[] vecs);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void MapVectors(float32[] vecs) cil managed

Docs.param: The array [x0, y0, x1, y1, ...] of vectors to transform.
Docs.summary: Apply this matrix to the array of 2D vectors, and write the transformed vectors back into the array.

remarks.para:
Apply this matrix to the array of 2D vectors, and write the transformed vectors back into the array.
Note: this method does not apply the translation associated with the matrix. Use if you want the translation to be applied.

Apply this matrix to the array of 2D vectors specified by src, and write the transformed vectors into the array of vectors specified by dst. The two arrays represent their "vectors" as pairs of floats [x, y].

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool RectStaysRect() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns true if will map a rectangle to another rectangle.

remarks.para: Returns true if will map a rectangle to another rectangle. This can be true if the matrix is identity, scale-only, or rotates a multiple of 90 degrees.

Docs.summary: (deep) copy the src matrix into this matrix.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool SetConcat (Android.Graphics.Matrix a, Android.Graphics.Matrix b);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool SetConcat(class Android.Graphics.Matrix a, class Android.Graphics.Matrix b) cil managed

Docs.summary: Set the matrix to the concatenation of the two specified matrices and return true.

remarks.para: Set the matrix to the concatenation of the two specified matrices and return true.
Either of the two matrices may also be the target matrix, that is matrixA.setConcat(matrixA, matrixB); is valid.
In and below, this function returns true only if the result can be represented. In and above, it always returns true.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool SetPolyToPoly (float[] src, int srcIndex, float[] dst, int dstIndex, int pointCount);

Docs.param: Index of the first pair of src values
Index of the first pair of dst values
The number of pairs/points to be used. Must be [0..4]
Docs.summary: Set the matrix such that the specified src points would map to the specified dst points.

remarks.para: Set the matrix such that the specified src points would map to the specified dst points. The "points" are represented as an array of floats, order [x0, y0, x1, y1, ...], where each "point" is 2 float values.

the destination rectangle to map to.
Docs.summary: Set the matrix to the scale and translate values that map the source rectangle to the destination rectangle, returning true if the the result can be represented.

remarks.para: Set the matrix to the scale and translate values that map the source rectangle to the destination rectangle, returning true if the the result can be represented.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void SetValues (float[] values);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetValues(float32[] values) cil managed

Docs.summary: Copy 9 values from the array into the matrix.

remarks.para: Copy 9 values from the array into the matrix. Depending on the implementation of Matrix, these may be transformed into 16.16 integers in the Matrix, such that a subsequent call to getValues() will not yield exactly the same values.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override IntPtr ThresholdClass { get; }
.property instance native int ThresholdClass

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which contains the java.lang.Class JNI value corresponding to this type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control which jclass is provided to methods like .

MemberSignature.Value: protected override Type ThresholdType { get; }
.property instance class System.Type ThresholdType

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control virtual vs. non virtual method dispatch against the underlying JNI object. When this property is equal to the declaring type, then virtual method invocation against the JNI object is performed; otherwise, we assume that the method was overridden by a derived type, and perform non-virtual methdo invocation.
